projects.title: OpenGL Model Viewer
projects.description: A graphics renderer that can display glTF models. Supports various shading algorithms including a physically based rendering implementation, along with phong and gooch shading.

projects.title: Rasterizer
projects.description: A software rasterizer written in C#. Supports rendering .obj models with phong shading. Implements a full rasterization pipeline in software with support for perspective correct interpolation, depth testing, backface culling and texture mapping.

projects.title: Synthesizer Visualizer
projects.description: A virtual piano keyboard that can be played. Can also play midis and display the notes being played in real-time.

projects.title: glTF-reader
projects.description: A small library that loads text and binary glTF files into a user friendly C++ structure.

projects.title: synthesizer
projects.description: Software sythesizer supporting various audio waveforms.

projects.title: midi
projects.description: Library for reading and writing binary Midi files.

projects.title: Emerging Finsights (version 1)
projects.description: The first version of the emerging finisights website. Implemented using a static site generator as a content managment system.

projects.title: Emerging Finsights (version 2)
projects.description: The second version of the emerging finisights website. Made using NextJS to provide server side rendering and used Directus as a content management system.
